"About the Equip Armor Units menu":
"Equip Armor

Equip different armor units and outfits (or parts). Select the slot in which you want to equip armor. From the list of equippable items that appears, select the item you want to equip.

Your selection will be applied to your character when you go back to the previous window.

See the Online Manual below for more information:
<&URL pso2_players_manual_preparations_equipment_armor>"
